mapper.sql: ID, TITTLE, DESCRIPTION, FACE_ID, FLOOR_AREA, POOL_AREA, EXPECT_PRICE, PROPERTY_FEE, THUMBNAIL_MODE, VR_MODE, COMMUNITY_ID, FLOOR, LAYOUT_ID, HOUSE_DECORATION_ID, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, ADDRESS, ELEVATOR_TYPE_ID, AGE, HOUSE_STATUS, ENABLED, SYS_STATUS
mapper.insert: insert into HOUSE (ID, TITTLE, DESCRIPTION, FACE_ID, FLOOR_AREA, POOL_AREA, EXPECT_PRICE, PROPERTY_FEE, THUMBNAIL_MODE, VR_MODE, COMMUNITY_ID, FLOOR, LAYOUT_ID, HOUSE_DECORATION_ID, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, ADDRESS, ELEVATOR_TYPE_ID, AGE, HOUSE_STATUS, ENABLED, SYS_STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tittle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floorArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{poolArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{expectPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{propertyFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{thumbnailMode,jdbcType=BIT}, #{vrMode,jdbcType=BIT}, #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{layoutId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseDecorationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elevatorTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sysStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update HOUSE
TITTLE = #{tittle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACE_ID = #{faceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLOOR_AREA = #{floorArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
POOL_AREA = #{poolArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
EXPECT_PRICE = #{expectPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PROPERTY_FEE = #{propertyFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
THUMBNAIL_MODE = #{thumbnailMode,jdbcType=BIT},
VR_MODE = #{vrMode,jdbcType=BIT},
COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAYOUT_ID = #{layoutId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOUSE_DECORATION_ID = #{houseDecorationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEVATOR_TYPE_ID = #{elevatorTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HOUSE_STATUS = #{houseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
SYS_STATUS = #{sysStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update HOUSE set TITTLE = #{tittle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACE_ID = #{faceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLOOR_AREA = #{floorArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, POOL_AREA = #{poolArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, EXPECT_PRICE = #{expectPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PROPERTY_FEE = #{propertyFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, THUMBNAIL_MODE = #{thumbnailMode,jdbcType=BIT}, VR_MODE = #{vrMode,jdbcType=BIT}, COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLOOR = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAYOUT_ID = #{layoutId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOUSE_DECORATION_ID = #{houseDecorationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEVATOR_TYPE_ID = #{elevatorTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOUSE_STATUS = #{houseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, SYS_STATUS = #{sysStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT HOUSE.ID, PROVINCE.id provinceID, PROVINCE.provinceName, CITY.id cityID, CITY.cityName, AREA.id areaID, AREA.areaName, HOUSE.ADDRESS, COMMUNITY.ID communityID, COMMUNITY.NAME communityName, COMMUNITY.LNG communityNameMapX, COMMUNITY.LAT communityNameMapY, COMMUNITY.COMPANY_ID communityCompanyID, HOUSE.DESCRIPTION, HOUSE_DECORATION.ID decorationID, HOUSE_DECORATION.NAME decorationName, HOUSE.FLOOR, HOUSE.EXPECT_PRICE, HOUSE.PROPERTY_FEE, HOUSE_FACE.ID houseFaceID, HOUSE_FACE.NAME houseFaceName, HOUSE_LAYOUT.ID houseLayoutID, HOUSE_LAYOUT.NAME houseLayout, HOUSE.TITTLE, HOUSE.POOL_AREA, HOUSE.FLOOR_AREA, HOUSE_STATUS.ID houseStatusID, HOUSE_STATUS.STATUS_NAME houseStatusName, HOUSE.ENABLED, HOUSE.AGE, HOUSE_ELEVATOR.ID elevatorID, HOUSE_ELEVATOR.NAME elevatorName FROM HOUSE JOIN PROVINCE ON HOUSE.PROVINCE_ID = PROVINCE.provinceID JOIN CITY ON HOUSE.CITY_ID = CITY.cityID JOIN AREA ON HOUSE.AREA_ID = AREA.areaID JOIN COMMUNITY ON HOUSE.COMMUNITY_ID = COMMUNITY.ID JOIN HOUSE_DECORATION ON HOUSE.HOUSE_DECORATION_ID = HOUSE_DECORATION.ID JOIN HOUSE_FACE ON HOUSE.FACE_ID = HOUSE_FACE.ID JOIN HOUSE_LAYOUT ON HOUSE.LAYOUT_ID = HOUSE_LAYOUT.ID JOIN HOUSE_STATUS ON HOUSE.HOUSE_STATUS = HOUSE_STATUS.ID JOIN HOUSE_ELEVATOR ON HOUSE.ELEVATOR_TYPE_ID = HOUSE_ELEVATOR.ID WHERE HOUSE.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND HOUSE.ENABLED > 0
